channel.title: Glitched Skulls
channel.description:
Hi, It's been along time since ive been down this section. But Ive came across a really annoying skull glitch
Everytime Someone gets a skull it looks like [img]http://www.runescapetop.com/up/images/76f95.png[/img]
Yes, I know what you're thinking. "Change client?"
Well I've done alot of work on this client and I dont want to be doing it all again.
I have 110% checked every single file and even the image files like head icons I cant find the glitched Icon ANYWHERE does anyone no how to make the skull be NORMAL or something else. Please help plawks

item.title: Glitched Skulls
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51

@Ashton51 wrote:

What Soure are you using?

and this is client-sided not server-sided

Read full topic

item.title: Glitched Skulls
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

facedesk either the file is hidden or it’s used from the runescape cache in that case just get a new client.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitched Skulls
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

lol hiliarious u try to make it sound that easy. when if i new the name of the sprite i would of fixed it my self. thats 1 of the reasons secondly ive tried to look everywhere in the sprite folders that looks like this still no.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitched Skulls
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

sigh* fine. first get the zfilesearcher and look up whatever the sprite is named in your sprites folder, it will show you where it is located in code. change that to your skull icon and you’re done… see? easy.

Read full topic

kk get off topic if ur not gonna help this is called the help section k?
